title: Guide to Environmental Preservation
summaries: The Guide to Environmental Preservation is a tool that prevents player attacks from breaking plants. It is not an accessory and will work as long as it is in the player's main inventory. It is purchased from the Dryad for 5.
After pressing âš· Open / Activate on it in the inventory or hotbar, it will turn into the Guide to Environmental Preservation (inactive), temporarily disabling its effects.

statistics.Tooltip:
Prevents you from accidentally destroying the environment while in the inventory
Right click to deactivate effects
statistics.Buy: 5
statistics.Sell: 1
